title: Typhoon Club (film)
content:
Typhoon Club (Japanese: 台風クラブ, Hepburn: Taifū Kurabu) is a 1985 Japanese film directed by Shinji Sōmai.

The film is about a group of young kids that get trapped inside their school during a large storm.

Yuka Ohnishi said she actually wore skin-colored underwear in the scene where students are dancing naked in the middle of a typhoon.[1]

The world premiere of a 4K restoration took place at Japan Society on April 27, 2023.[2]

7th Yokohama Film Festival[3]

1st Tokyo International Film Festival

10th Hochi Film Award[5]
